/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is dotted with cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise serene setting. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes Beijing's cityscape.
